inactiveLoanHistory.title: No Loan Information At This Time
inactiveLoanHistory.description: We do not have loan data for you at this time. If you previously attended UC Berkeley, please refer to National Student Loan Data Systems for Federal Direct Loans and Heartland ECSI for Institutional, State, Perkins or HPSL loans. Consult your private loan lender for private loan details.

links.title: Bears for Financial Success
links.descr: Sit down with a financial wellness peer educator to help you understand your personal finances. Peer mentors can answer basic money management questions and help you create a personal spending plan. This service is for current students only.
links.hover: Meet with a financial wellness peer educator

links.title: Cal Student Central
links.descr: Contact with any questions regarding your loans.

links.title: Federal Loan Detail
links.descr: Log in to National Student Loan Data Systems (NSLDS) to view your detailed federal loan history.
links.hover: NSLDS website to view your Federal loan details

links.title: Federal Loan Summary
links.descr: Log in to studentaid.ed.gov to view a summary of your federal loan history.

links.title: Institutional, State, Perkins and HPSL Loan Detail
links.descr: Visit your loan servicer Heartland ESCI to access your Perkins, HPSL, state and/or institutional loan account(s).
links.hover: State and Institutional Loan Servicer - Heartland ESCI

links.title: Loan Documentation
links.descr: Log in to studentloans.gov to complete or view your Federal Direct Master Promissory Note, Entrance, or Exit Counseling.

links.title: Loan Repayment Estimator
links.descr: You can include Institutional, HPSL, State and/or Private loans by clicking the Add Loan(s) link and selecting Private, then enter the loan amount and interest rate for each additional loan.
links.hover: A tool to estimate your loan repayment
